title: LF player for gold team
body:
LF GOLD JG/ADC/SUP ON OCE for a team,

If u wanna join the team,

Be prepared to:

- play a lot of games
- have a mindset to accept constructive criticism 
- improve 
- have fun 

Add MidBlade if u wanna join and make sure u can play 3+ champs.

Discord: MidBlade#2750 or Beerus#0622
